blogPost.excerpt:
An emotional Lionel Messi has revealed he expected to extend his stay at Barcelona, but is now a free agent after financial issues at the Catalan club left them unable to pay the Argentinian’s wages. Speaking at his farewell press conference on Sunday morning, a tearful Messi said: 'This year, my family and I were convinced we were going to stay at home, that’s what we all wanted more than anything.'

'We’d always made this our own, we were at home. We thought we would be staying here in Barcelona. But today, we have to say goodbye to all of this.'
blogPost.body:
An emotional Lionel Messi has revealed he expected to extend his stay at Barcelona, but is now a free agent after financial issues at the Catalan club left them unable to pay the Argentinian’s wages. Speaking at his farewell press conference on Sunday morning, a tearful Messi said: 'This year, my family and I were convinced we were going to stay at home, that’s what we all wanted more than anything.'

'We’d always made this our own, we were at home. We thought we would be staying here in Barcelona. But today, we have to say goodbye to all of this.'
blogPost.title: 'I am here to say goodbye': Lionel Messi tearful as Barcelona exit looms
blogPost.author: Guardian Football

One Taco gets expensive parts, and one gets cheap parts. Then we test them, to see which components are worth spending your hard-earned money on.

at $342 per tire!
And Low Truck is getting some enda Klever All-Terrainss which are less than half the price at $147 per tire
